body: query {productschedulelist (pagination:{limit: "10"}){ productschedules { id, name, cycles {length, position, next_position, price, shipping_price, cycle_products{product { id, name, sku, ship, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { name } } },is_shipping,quantity,position}}, created_at, updated_at }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page } }, }
